Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's Underwater Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke O'Dowd as The Human Meteor, from his initial introduction and transformation to his underwater mission against a submarine threat.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces The Human Meteor and Duke O'Dowd, setting the stage for the narrative and Duke's initial taxi driving activities.

sub_scenes.title: Ambush and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the escalating conflict as Duke is pursued and ambushed, leading to his transformation into The Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and New Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Human Meteor's immediate response to the attack, the arrival of police, and the briefing that sets up his next mission.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke's plan to infiltrate the yacht and the initial stages of his mission as a stowaway.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation with Submarine Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's underwater actions, confronting enemy divers and attacking the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Surface Aftermath and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers events on the surface ship and yacht, resolving Peter's situation and concluding Human Meteor's immediate actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map
Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads and their confrontation with Nazi fiends, including the ambulance scene and the boys finding a crucial clue.

sub_scenes.title: Battlefield and Ambulance Incident
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Liberty Lads in combat and transitions to a separate scene involving an ambulance and two boys.

sub_scenes.title: The Wallet Clue and Major Bronson Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene centers around the boys' discovery of a dropped wallet and the clue it provides, leading to the introduction of Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

Major_Arcs.title: The Bus Garage Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys as they get involved with Mr. Horst at the bus garage, leading to danger and Major Bronson's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Interception at the Bus Garage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the boys' chase and their interaction with the police, leading them to Mr. Horst's office.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return

sub_scenes.title: Threat and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the escalating threat from Mr. Horst and Major Bronson's sudden intervention to protect the boys.

narrative_arcs.title: Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat
Initial Melee and Call to Stop

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes the boys seeking help, the discovery of sabotage plans, the attack on the Marine Barracks, and the final confrontation with Nazi spies.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the boys' escape and their discovery of a secret office containing sabotage plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Attack on Marine Barracks and Counter-Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the attack on the Marine Barracks and the initial confrontations within.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue and Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Champ and Henry in South America as they get entangled in intrigue and work to rescue Rosita from Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Intrigue and Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Champ and Henry and the setting in South America, revealing Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Suspicion and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts officers' actions and their explanation to Champ and Henry about Rosita's kidnapping and El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Capture and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Champ and Henry's encounter with El Tigre, leading to their capture and subsequent rescue mission for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre
Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents
Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated
Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Jungle Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission, his capture, torture, and eventual resolution of a conflict involving native tribes and foreign agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Introduction and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in the jungle and sets up the initial conflict and his capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture and Plan Extraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's capture, the suspicion surrounding him, and the brutal torture to extract information.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Action and Tribal Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the arson incident, marine actions, and the unexpected resolution involving the native tribe.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam
Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins as they investigate the murder of a banker, leading them through hospitals, candy stores, and into a community-wide effort to save a life.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case: the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Barnacci Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the twins' visit to the hospital and their developing suspicion of Barnacci's involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and Community Support
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the twins' search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, their encounter with Mrs. Murphy, and the subsequent chase.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat
Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information
Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
